channel.title: [Delta] Eventmanager related issue

item.title: [Delta] Eventmanager related issue
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent( new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { sM("the logs catch fire"); fmwalkto(-1,0); c.stop(); } }, 1000); // executes after 2,000 ms = 2 seconds };

This here is my code, it executes the sendmessage but not the ‘fmwalkto’… why? If I put the ‘fmwalkto’ outside of the eventmanager, it works… why?

Read full topic
